learning_outcomes.description: Understand the strategies that animals and plants adopt to sustain viable populations
Understand the commonalties between plant and animals ecological strategies
Appreciate how functions and strategies can be compared among species across the globe
Understand how functional ecology can be applied to real world problems

assessments.task_description: Practical worksheets
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 1 grade for each 24 hour period from time submission is due will apply for up to 7 days. After 7 days you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
